FAQ.title: Frequently <highlight>Asked Questions</highlight>
FAQ.subtitle: Clear answers for informed decisions.
FAQ.q1: How soon will my site be live and generating results?
FAQ.a1: A premium landing page is ready in 3â€“5 days. A full professional website takes 2â€“4 weeks. We focus on delivering a high-performance asset as quickly as possible without compromising quality.
FAQ.q2: Will my site be unique, or could it look like my competitorsâ€™?
FAQ.a2: Forget generic templates. We design every interface from scratch for your brand, ensuring your business stands out with an exclusive, modern, and unforgettable design.
FAQ.q3: How do you guarantee the site wonâ€™t lag or load slowly on mobile?
FAQ.a3: We use Next.js and Core Web Vitals optimization to ensure instant loading. Your site will be faster than 99% of competitors, delivering a flawless experience on any smartphone.
FAQ.q4: Iâ€™ve had bad experiences with slow sites before. What makes yours different?
FAQ.a4: Most agencies use WordPress with heavy plugins. We use pure engineering with Next.jsâ€”the same tech used by Netflix and TikTok. The result? A lightweight, secure, and extremely fast site.
FAQ.q5: How will new customers find my business on Google?
FAQ.a5: We go beyond basics. We conduct keyword research, optimize metadata, ensure immediate indexing, and configure Rich Results so your site appears prominently in search results.
FAQ.q6: Is the site just â€˜pretty,â€™ or will it actually convert visitors?
FAQ.a6: Beauty is just the starting pointâ€”conversion (CRO) is the goal. Every button and line of text is strategically placed to turn curious visitors into qualified leads.
FAQ.q7: If my business grows, can the site evolve with new features?
FAQ.a7: Absolutely. Our code is modular and scalable. In the future, you can easily add booking systems, client areas, or e-commerce without rebuilding from scratch.
FAQ.q8: What real advantages does a website offer my business?
FAQ.a8: A premium website is your digital authority hub. Unlike social media, you fully control the narrative, centralize contacts, boost brand perception, and ensure youâ€™re found on Google by qualified customersâ€”24/7.
FAQ.q9: How will English or German tourists find my business?
FAQ.a9: Our professional plan includes multilingual support (up to 4 languages) and advanced local SEO. Your site will be optimized to appear in English or German searches, capturing the Algarveâ€™s highest-spending international market.
FAQ.q10: What if I need to quickly change a price or photo during summer?
FAQ.a10: We know the Algarve moves fast. With our turnkey delivery, everything is pre-configured, and we offer priority WhatsApp support. If you prefer hands-off management, our â‚¬50/month plan ensures changes are made by us within hours.
FAQ.q11: Will I face surprise costs for hosting or security?
FAQ.a11: Total transparency: the â‚¬350 or â‚¬650 construction fees are fixed. The â‚¬50/month subscription covers everything needed to keep your site online, secure (SSL included), and ultra-fast. No hidden fees or abusive annual renewals.

Consent.title: We value your privacy
Consent.description: We use cookies to improve your experience, deliver personalized content, and analyze traffic. By clicking â€œAccept All,â€ you agree to our use of cookies. Read our <link>Cookie Policy</link> and <linkPrivacy>Privacy Policy</linkPrivacy>.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: Commitment to transparency and protection of your personal data, fully compliant with GDPR.
Privacy.summary_text: Websites Algarve values user privacy. This policy details how we process your personal data, ensuring security, confidentiality, and respect for your rights in strict compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
Privacy.section1_text: The entity responsible for data processing is Websites Algarve. Any privacy-related inquiries may be sent to:
Privacy.section2_text: We collect only data strictly necessary for service operation and requested commercial communication:
Privacy.section2_li1: Identification: Name, Email, Phone (for quotes and support).
Privacy.section2_li2: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device, and approximate location (via Google Analytics, only with consent).
Privacy.section2_li3: Project Data: Voluntarily provided business information for consulting purposes.
Privacy.section2_li4: Marketing: Newsletters or promotions require explicit opt-in consent.
Privacy.section3_text: Personal data will be retained only as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected:
Privacy.section3_li1: Contact/Customer Data: Kept during the commercial relationship or as legally required (e.g., invoicing).
Privacy.section3_li2: Marketing Data: Until consent is withdrawn.
Privacy.section3_li3: Analytics Cookies: As defined in the Cookie Policy (max 2 years for Google Analytics).
Privacy.section4_text: Websites Algarve does not sell personal data. Sharing occurs only with GDPR-compliant subcontractors:
Privacy.section4_li1: Google Analytics (USA): For statistical analysis (with anonymized IP).
Privacy.section4_li2: Supabase/Vercel: As secure hosting and database infrastructure.
Privacy.section5_text: We implement advanced technical measures, including SSL/TLS encryption for all communications and databases protected with strict access controls.
Privacy.section6_text: Under GDPR, you have the following rights, exercisable free of charge:
Privacy.section6_li1: Access: Request a copy of the data we hold about you.
Privacy.section6_li2: Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
Privacy.section6_li3: Erasure: Request deletion of your data (unless legal obligations prevent it).
Privacy.section6_li4: Portability: Receive your data in a structured format.
Privacy.section6_li5: Objection: Object to data processing for marketing purposes.
Privacy.section7_text: If you believe your data is not being lawfully processed, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the Portuguese Data Protection Authority (CNPD).

Terms.section4_text: The Client agrees to provide accurate information and not use the services for unlawful purposes. Websites Algarve reserves the right to suspend services if abusive or illegal use is detected.
Terms.section5_text: Websites Algarve makes every effort to ensure continuous service availability but cannot be held liable for third-party failures (e.g., global servers, internet outages) or force majeure events.
Terms.section6_text: These Terms and Conditions are governed by Portuguese Law. Any disputes arising from this agreement shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the Courts of Faro, with express waiver of any other.

Cookies.title: Cookie Policy
Cookies.subtitle: Full transparency regarding tracking technologies used to enhance your experience.
Cookies.section1_text: Cookies are small data files stored on your device that allow the site to 'remember' your preferences and analyze your interaction. They contain no malware and cannot execute programs.
Cookies.section2_text: On your first visit, a cookie consent panel appears. You may accept all, reject non-essential cookies, or customize preferences granularly. You can change these settings anytime via your browser settings.
Cookies.section3_text: We use different types of cookies for distinct purposes:
Cookies.cookie1_desc: Stores your cookie acceptance/rejection choice to prevent repeated prompts.
Cookies.cookie2_desc: Maintains your active language session to ensure content displays in the correct language.
Cookies.cookie3_desc: Distinguishes unique users to generate anonymous site usage statistics.
